entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
